backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing clients, tasks, assignees, and user profiles with access‑controlled CRUD operations and per‑caller storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a URL token‑cleanup requirement linked to specific source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root mount node, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with authentication checks, deferred URL cleanup, profile‑setup gating, and route definitions for all pages.
frontend/src/components/assignees/Assign: Dialog for bulk assignee uploads supporting CSV parsing, validation, error display, and submission via React Query.
Dialog form for creating, editing, or deleting assignees with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Landing screen for signed‑out users with branding, feature highlights, and login button.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: Dialog for uploading a CSV, validating rows, and bulk‑creating clients through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Dialog form to create, update, or delete a client with validation and various fields.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppStartu: Error boundary that catches startup errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/StartupEr: Fallback screen showing an error message with an option to reload the page.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation, user menu, mobile drawer, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/InlineComm: Provides an inline UI to view and edit a task's comment with save and cancel actions using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Dialog for bulk‑editing multiple tasks, collecting optional field updates and submitting them via a bulk update mutation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Dialog that imports tasks from a CSV file, validates them, previews results, and submits them for bulk creation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskDetail: Read‑only display panel showing all task details with formatted status, dates, text, and amounts.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing a single task with full form fields and create/update mutations.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Compact status selector that updates a task's status using the update mutation hook.
frontend/src/constants/taskStatus.ts: Defines allowed task statuses and helpers for normalizing, validating, and displaying task status values.
frontend/src/hooks/assignees.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on assignees using the actor API, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and bulk operations on clients with actor-based calls.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: React Query hooks for task retrieval and full CRUD plus bulk operations, calling actor methods and invalidating task caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and save the authenticated user's profile through the actor with proper loading and cache handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeferredUrlCleanup: Reads secret params from the URL, stores them in session storage, and removes them from the URL after mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme variables and global UI color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Deprecated client parsing helpers kept for compatibility, mapping old encoded client formats to explicit fields.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and mounting the app.
frontend/src/pages/AssigneesPage.tsx: Page for listing, searching, editing, bulk uploading, and bulk deleting assignees with selection handling.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single client's details, related tasks, and stats with edit and task creation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists clients with search, selection, bulk delete, and bulk upload, plus navigation to client details.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing task statistics, upcoming and overdue tasks, with navigation to filtered task views.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Task management page with filtering, sorting, search, bulk actions, editing, and CSV import/export.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Utilities for generating, downloading, parsing, and validating CSV files for assignee bulk upload.
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: Generates CSV templates and parses client CSV files with basic validation.
frontend/src/utils/taskAggregations.ts: Provides aggregation utilities for tasks by category, subcategory, status, and revenue.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Builds task CSV templates and parses task CSV files into validated ExtendedTaskInput objects.
frontend/src/utils/taskDisplay.ts: Formats task dates, currency values, and optional text for UI display.
frontend/src/utils/taskExcel.ts: Converts tasks to Excel format and exports them using the SheetJS library.
frontend/src/utils/taskSort.ts: Sorts tasks by various fields with null-safe comparison helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-scoped parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color tokens, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature requirements for a task/client management app.
